comment:
* Notification policy configuration.  Represents user-preferences for notification
     * filtering.

variables.name: PRIORITY_CATEGORY_REMINDERS
variables.comment: Reminder notifications are prioritized.

variables.name: PRIORITY_CATEGORY_EVENTS
variables.comment: Event notifications are prioritized.

variables.name: PRIORITY_CATEGORY_MESSAGES
variables.comment: Message notifications are prioritized.

variables.name: PRIORITY_CATEGORY_CALLS
variables.comment: Calls are prioritized.

variables.name: PRIORITY_CATEGORY_REPEAT_CALLERS
variables.comment: Calls from repeat callers are prioritized.

variables.name: PRIORITY_CATEGORY_ALARMS
variables.comment: Alarms are prioritized

variables.name: PRIORITY_CATEGORY_MEDIA
variables.comment: Media, game, voice navigation are prioritized

variables.name: PRIORITY_CATEGORY_SYSTEM
variables.comment: System (catch-all for non-never suppressible sounds) are prioritized

variables.name: PRIORITY_CATEGORY_CONVERSATIONS
variables.comment: * Conversations are allowed through DND.

variables.name: ALL_PRIORITY_CATEGORIES
variables.comment: * @hide

variables.name: PRIORITY_SENDERS_ANY
variables.comment: Any sender is prioritized.

variables.name: PRIORITY_SENDERS_CONTACTS
variables.comment: Saved contacts are prioritized.

variables.name: PRIORITY_SENDERS_STARRED
variables.comment: Only starred contacts are prioritized.

variables.name: CONVERSATION_SENDERS_ANYONE
variables.comment: * Used to indicate all conversations can bypass dnd.

variables.name: CONVERSATION_SENDERS_IMPORTANT
variables.comment: * Used to indicate important conversations can bypass dnd.

variables.name: CONVERSATION_SENDERS_NONE
variables.comment: * Used to indicate no conversations can bypass dnd.

variables.name: priorityCategories
variables.comment: Notification categories to prioritize. Bitmask of PRIORITY_CATEGORY_* constants.

variables.name: priorityCallSenders
variables.comment:
Notification senders to prioritize for calls. One of:
         * PRIORITY_SENDERS_ANY, PRIORITY_SENDERS_CONTACTS, PRIORITY_SENDERS_STARRED

variables.name: priorityMessageSenders
variables.comment:
Notification senders to prioritize for messages. One of:
         * PRIORITY_SENDERS_ANY, PRIORITY_SENDERS_CONTACTS, PRIORITY_SENDERS_STARRED

variables.name: priorityConversationSenders
variables.comment:
* Notification senders to prioritize for conversations. One of:
         * {@link #CONVERSATION_SENDERS_NONE}, {@link #CONVERSATION_SENDERS_IMPORTANT},
         * {@link #CONVERSATION_SENDERS_ANYONE}.

variables.name: CONVERSATION_SENDERS_UNSET
variables.comment: * @hide

variables.name: SUPPRESSED_EFFECTS_UNSET
variables.comment: * @hide

variables.name: SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_SCREEN_OFF
variables.comment:
* Whether notifications suppressed by DND should not interrupt visually (e.g. with
         * notification lights or by turning the screen on) when the screen is off.
         *
         * @deprecated use {@link #SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_FULL_SCREEN_INTENT} and
         * {@link #SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_AMBIENT} and {@link #SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_LIGHTS} individually.

variables.name: SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_SCREEN_ON
variables.comment:
* Whether notifications suppressed by DND should not interrupt visually when the screen
         * is on (e.g. by peeking onto the screen).
         *
         * @deprecated use {@link #SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_PEEK}.

variables.name: SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_FULL_SCREEN_INTENT
variables.comment:
* Whether {@link Notification#fullScreenIntent full screen intents} from
         * notifications intercepted by DND are blocked.

variables.name: SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_LIGHTS
variables.comment:
* Whether {@link NotificationChannel#shouldShowLights() notification lights} from
         * notifications intercepted by DND are blocked.

variables.name: SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_PEEK
variables.comment: * Whether notifications intercepted by DND are prevented from peeking.

variables.name: SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_STATUS_BAR
variables.comment:
* Whether notifications intercepted by DND are prevented from appearing in the status bar,
         * on devices that support status bars.

variables.name: SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_BADGE
variables.comment:
* Whether {@link NotificationChannel#canShowBadge() badges} from
         * notifications intercepted by DND are blocked on devices that support badging.

variables.name: SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_AMBIENT
variables.comment:
* Whether notification intercepted by DND are prevented from appearing on ambient displays
         * on devices that support ambient display.

variables.name: SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_NOTIFICATION_LIST
variables.comment:
* Whether notification intercepted by DND are prevented from appearing in notification
         * list views like the notification shade or lockscreen on devices that support those
         * views.

variables.name: suppressedVisualEffects
variables.comment:
* Visual effects to suppress for a notification that is filtered by Do Not Disturb mode.
         * Bitmask of SUPPRESSED_EFFECT_* constants.

variables.name: STATE_CHANNELS_BYPASSING_DND
variables.comment: * @hide

variables.name: STATE_UNSET
variables.comment: * @hide

variables.name: state
variables.comment:
* Notification state information that is necessary to determine Do Not Disturb behavior.
         * Bitmask of STATE_* constants.
         * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
private boolean suppressedVisualEffectsEqual(int suppressedEffects, int otherSuppressedVisualEffects)
public void dumpDebug(ProtoOutputStream proto, long fieldId)
private static void bitwiseToProtoEnum(ProtoOutputStream proto, long fieldId, int data)
private static int toggleEffects(int currentEffects, int[] effects, boolean suppress)
public Policy copy()
methods.comment:
* returns a deep copy of this policy
         * @hide

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
private boolean suppressedVisualEffectsEqual(int suppressedEffects, int otherSuppressedVisualEffects)
public void dumpDebug(ProtoOutputStream proto, long fieldId)
private static void bitwiseToProtoEnum(ProtoOutputStream proto, long fieldId, int data)
private static int toggleEffects(int currentEffects, int[] effects, boolean suppress)
